entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending late this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming east 20 gusting to 40 near noon then becoming southwest 20. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
